price: Indeed, when the floodwater overflowed, We carried you [O humans] in the sailing Ark[3],
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ
footnotes: [3] Which was made by Noah with Allah's command.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
